body: I usually hate pretty much everything related to netorare, but is this really NTR? They clearly don’t really have a relationship beyond classmates and from what I can see he just finds out her secret while delving into emotions that won’t ever be reciprocated. Hell, the worst I can see this as is she’s filming having sex with her boyfriend and the twat, knowing that yet still having a crush on her, still watches their videos. If anything, he’s enjoying the feeling of cuckold he gets.
This isn't NTR, It's just a classmate finding out her secret. The title is something like classmate behind their backs, maybe im sick of my daily life
Isn't this the apex of all hentai ? Smegma (done well) + netorare + amazing art. Really hoping for a translation. Also really hoping to see more in the future from this artist
